raw.text:
Hello hello, my name is Gianluca Venturini.
I’m a Software Engineer and I live in San Francisco.

I spent most of my years in the beautiful and sunny country of Italy mostly living in Mantova and Milano. After a thrilling chapter in Chicago I moved to the Bay Area to level up my software product craftsmanship skills.

Beside my main professional focus on Product Engineering I’m constantly learning and striving to become better at physics, math, self improvement, body building and design.

I most of all like to have adventures around the world with old and new friends, at this point of my life I’ve a friendbaseTM quite distributed in different places.

Welcome to my personal website. The goal here is to have a clean place outside the noisy social networks to brainstorm and sketch ideas. Thoughts here are purposely left a work in progress.
